short_summary: The Shared Service Canada organization seeks to procure an organizational charting software and training for the Department of Justice Canada, to support the execution of the Department's mandate and organizational structure.
description: The Department of Justice Canada has the mandate to support the dual roles of the Minister of Justice and the Attorney General of Canada. The Department provides legal advice to the Government and federal government departments and agencies represent the Crown in civil litigation. The Human Resources and Information Services Branches maintain the departmental Human Resources Management System and peripheral Human Resources applications.
full_summary:
### Request for Proposal - Organizational Charting Software and Training for the Department of Justice Canada

#### Project Details

*   Solicitation Number: SSC-22-00020346
*   Publication Date: October 3, 2022
*   Tender Closing Date: November 1, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
*   Amendment Date: October 26, 2022

#### Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a proposal for the provision of organizational charting software and training for the Department of Justice Canada. The successful bidder will be responsible for delivering the software and training to SSC, who will then provide shared services to the Department of Justice Canada.

#### Requirements

*   Provide an organizational charting software solution that meets the Department of Justice Canada's specific needs
*   Deliver training to SSC and Department of Justice Canada employees on the use of the software
*   Ensure the software is compatible with Treasury Board Standard hardware

#### Evaluation Criteria

*   Technical merit and price

#### Delivery

*   275 Sparks Street, Ottawa, ON

#### Security Requirements

*   None

#### Trade Agreements

*   All trade agreements apply to this requirement.

#### Exclusions

*   This bid solicitation does not preclude Canada from using another method of supply for entities of the Government of Canada with the same or similar needs.

#### How to Bid

*   Respondents must submit their bids electronically through the Shared Services Canada Procure to Pay (P2) Portal by the tender closing date.
*   All documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

#### Contact Information

*   Marco Bonett, Procurement Officer
*   Shared Services Canada
*   Phone: (343) 543-6307
*   Email: marco.bonett@ssc-spc.gc.ca
